## Source: amazon-inspector (827b1d3e49cfad3ca5aa4eeb1a7afedc234ed734e13948ba28b0e3b3b71180cc)
The package wds-icons was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (fb173468877c6a6ec8dd97252a49a2e007320448f178d14dafe5fd5ceaeddac2)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'wds-icons' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
